DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Safety Tolerability INCB019602 When Administered With Metformin Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Established diagnosis T2D Currently take metformin monotherapy stable dose level FPG 150 270 mg/dL History clinical manifestation renal impairment Hyperglycemia > 270 mg/dL Receiving thiazolidenediones , Exenatide sulfonylureas within 90 day prior screen Prior use Acipimox know name Olbetam within 90 day prior screen .
